meaning_str.bing:
n. 英寸（长度单位，等于 2.54 厘米，1 英尺等于 12 英寸）
v. （使朝某方向）谨慎移动
网络. 尺寸；英制；寸动

英寸（长度单位，等于 2.54 厘米，1 英尺等于 12 英寸）

英寸（长度单位）；少量；微小的进步；一点点；腰围；身高
缓慢地移动；逐渐前进；慢慢挪动；小心翼翼地移动

1.en: He was absolutely inch-perfect in qualifying, when it was very easy to make a mistake on the tyres as we saw other drivers were doing.
1.cn: 他几乎在排位赛上表现完美，而我们常常看到其他车手在轮胎上犯错误。

2.en: Bicycle wheel fell in love with the front wheel, but he knew he could never be with him. So he kiss times he walks every inch of the land.
2.cn: 自行车的后轮爱上了前轮，可是他知道自己永远不可能和他在一起。于是他吻遍了他走过的每一寸土地。

3.en: The door was flung open and there rushed in a paunchy middle-aged man, with inch-long hair cut close to his head.
3.cn: 大门猛然推开，一名只留有一寸长短发、腹大便便的中年男子冲了进来。

0.en: Raj, you will be painting sideburns and a Van Dyke on a six-inch figurine of Legolas the elf.
0.cn: 拉杰，你要在六英寸高的精灵王子模型上画出连鬓胡和短尖髯。

1.en: Air shaft? 6 inch diameter pipe. Foundation? 12 feet of concrete, top and bottom.
1.cn: 通风口呢？管道直径只有六英寸。地基呢？混凝土厚达十二英尺，上下都是。

2.en: Real amateur hour. Another inch to the left and the igniter would have been too far from the gas tank to set it off.
2.cn: 业余得很，再往左边一英寸点火器就离汽车油箱远得根本点不着了。

3.en: The last one is at Fort Meade, behind three guarded gates and a twelve-inch steel wall. Shouldn't be a problem.
3.cn: 最后一个在米德堡，有三道大门把守，还有堵12英寸厚的钢墙。这不算事儿。

4.en: How little? I, I don't know, like this? A little one-inch man saved us? Well, if he got closer, I'm sure he'd be much larger.
4.cn: 多矮？我，我不确定。这么矮。一个一英寸的人救了我们？好吧，如果再靠近点看，我觉得他应该会高得多。

5.en: You'll attack me the moment I let you go. No I won't. You would think an evil super-villain would learn how to properly lie. I bet it's the one-inch man.
5.cn: 一旦放了你，你就会袭击我。不，我不会。你应该知道一个穷凶极恶的恶棍通常都会学习如何撒谎。我敢打赌一定是那个一英寸高的人。

6.en: We all see you prancing along the street, Your Honor! And you're, what, and I'm just approximating here, like, an inch tall? You... What are you doing? Voilà! What the... Daddy!
6.cn: 大家都见过你走路时候的滑稽样子，法官大人！其实你只有... 以下都是我个人的猜测，只有一英寸高？你想干嘛？瞧啊！这可无效…爸爸！

7.en: We designed every inch of it. Every blade of grass.
7.cn: 每一分一毫都是我们设计的，每片草叶。

8.en: Aw! Look at that, every inch of this stuff is glued down.

9.en: The lack of gravity did decompress my spine, so I'm like an inch and a half taller.
9.cn: 失重状态拉松了我的脊柱，所以我高了3.8厘米。

10.en: There's nothing left to map. I've run every inch of it myself. Every cycle. Every pattern.
10.cn: 全部都在这里了，我跑遍了迷宫的每个角落，每一层，每面墙。

11.en: Lure them into the city and then our gamemakers will make them pay for every inch with blood.
11.cn: 诱敌深入城中，我们的游戏设计者将让他们血债血还。

12.en: Drinking the blood of a unicorn will keep you alive even if you are an inch from death, but at a terrible price.
12.cn: 喝了独角兽的血能延续你的生命，哪怕你在濒临死亡的时候，可这代价很惨重。
